title: mri_mc
description: Extract a surface from a label volume using Marching Cubes algorithm.

input_volume.title: Input Volume
input_volume.description: The input volume from which to extract the surface.

label_value.title: Label Value
label_value.description: The label value of the structure to extract.

output_surface.title: Output Surface
output_surface.description: The file where the extracted surface mesh will be saved.

connectivity.title: Connectivity
connectivity.description: The connectivity used for Marching Cubes. Options are: 1=6+, 2=18, 3=6, 4=26.
